LMRTFY.Title: Let Me Roll That For You!
LMRTFY.AdvantageNote: These rolls will be made with advantage
LMRTFY.DisadvantageNote: These rolls will be made with disadvantage
LMRTFY.WindowTitlePlaceholder: They see me Rollin', they hating'
LMRTFY.MessagePlaceholder: Roll to see if you find any traps...
LMRTFY.RollerIntro: Your GM has requested rolls from your character(s):
LMRTFY.EnableParchmentThemeHint: Enables the use of the stylized UI with a parchment look
LMRTFY.SentNotification: LMRTFY: Roll request sent to connected players
LMRTFY.DeselectOnRequestorRenderHint: Enable to prevent roll requests from being sent to GM user (yourself)
LMRTFY.ChooseOneDM: Player chooses one request to roll:
LMRTFY.UseTokenImageOnRequester: Use the token's image on the requestor
LMRTFY.UseTokenImageOnRequesterHint: When opening the roll requester, use the token's image instead of the actor portrait
LMRTFY.Selected: Controlled token at time of macro run
LMRTFY.SelectedNotification: The selected user can only be used with 'Save Request as Macro'
LMRTFY.NoSelectedToken: Token(s) needs to be selected before the macro can be run
LMRTFY.ShowFailButtonsHint: Show fail buttons for ability checks, ability saves and skill the requested roll form

Trained.PreventUntrained: Prevent Untrained Skills from being rolled.
Trained.AllowUntrained: Allow Untrained Skills to be rolled.

Requestor.Title: Let me roll that for you: Request Roll

SelectRolls.Title: Select Rolls
SelectRolls.ContextHint: When a roll requires it (for example, Initiative requires a Combat context), select the context for that roll.
SelectRolls.RollNumberHint: Select if receivers need to roll one, must roll all, or can roll any number.
SelectRolls.RollPrivacyHint: Select what roll privacy that players should roll.
SelectRolls.RequireRollPrivacyHint: If checked, roll privacy should be enforced, and cannot be changed by the player.
SelectRolls.TitleHint: Enter in a title for the roller window.
SelectRolls.MessageHint: Enter in a message for the roller window.

Errors.NoActive: None of the users you have selected are online to receive the request.
